name: Pixel Runner
description:
Pixel Runner is an intense arcade/action game! In this game you have infinite momentum in last two directions you pressed and you have to avoid the evil red pixels that want to kill you! You can only move in diagonal directions and you can never stop moving. Well until you hit the wall.

Now if you wanna know a little about me, My name is Kevin and I am 14 and I have always loved video games and I have always wanted to make my own so I have gotten in to creating video games and I think it is awesome I have started and I hope to make each game I create better then the last. :D

Also I would love feedback and support either by paying what ever you want or leaving a reply about the game!
